task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:
Hello, Janice

You haven't `Submitted` your work from the GCI dashboard. So, I can't take any action on the task.  

Regarding the audio, as legal matters like this may pose problems later on, I'd consider leaving it for someone who possesses knowledge in this domain. Although the screenshot you attached does mention "free for non-profit", the second paragraph also refrains from using the file to promote any product. Since I'm not sure if our case obliges to the condition, I'll leave it for Ed to consider it.

I'll suggest you sending a link to the video with the music too (if you still have that). The concerned people may have a look at it when they'll have time. 

By the way, the latest video ends the demo abruptly and does not show the "beneficiary added" screen. AFAIK, the previous video did have that.
task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:

Thank you!
Janice K.

text:
Hello,
The backing track is described as free for ânot for profit,â meaning that the the track should not be used for advertising a money-making company. 

As for the voice recording, I just used the iPhone voice recorder and Apple headphone microphone for clarity. :)

I have attached a full description of the trackâs usage.
task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App
Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:
I'm so fascinated with the voiceover that I can't hold myself from asking how did you make it so professional?!

However, I do have some reservations regarding the backing track. To add any content, we must have consent to use the material. It calls for answering questions like - Is that a copyrighted or royalty-free audio? Does the owner/copyright-holder allow others to use the music? 
If you don't have clear answers to the above questions and/or have not got the consent in written form (unless it's clearly stated on the source website that the item can be used for any purpose), the best bet would be to avoid it. 

Please trim the last 2 seconds of the video which thank the viewer. Apparently, the viewer is thankful to the creator for making and sharing the demo video.

You can remove the initial opening too as the narration sets the context very well. I understand that the part is less than a second. So, leave it as it is if you can't remove it easily or if it affects the narration.
task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App
Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App
Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:
1. The video seems to be going too fast (somewhat like fast forward). Please slow it down. As you have almost 30 more seconds, slowing should not pose any problem. It's fine if you speed the video up while writing text or while the progress bar is shown but for other parts, natural (or close to natural) pace is preferred.

2. Add a voiceover too. It looks quite bland without any narration. Note that the work you submit will most probably be incorporated in the documentation and hence, the 'acceptable' quality here, tantamounts to 'superior' quality as we have high expectations from the GCI participants. ;)

Don't forget to use some noise filter prior to sending the video.

Great work otherwise. Although you missed saving account's details, it's still good and you don't need to record again. :) 

Thank you very much for confirming the devices on which the app crashed and I apologize for the inconvenience caused. It'll soon be resolved.
task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:
As for the APIs/ Phone types I tried the app on:
Nexus 5X API 27
Nexus 6P API 27
Nexus S API 25
Pixel 2 XL API 26
Pixel 2 XL API 27
Pixel API 26

Hope this helps,
Janice K.

text:
Hey janicek,

I apologize for the inconvenience. It'll be great if you could tell which APIs you've tried it on and found it crashing. 

To answer your question, I'm afraid I can't approve the task unless it satisfies all the requirements. Nevertheless, I've checked that the app works fine on Lollipop devices. If you happen to have some device with Lollipop, you can use that or create Android Virtual Device (also called emulator) to complete the task.
task_definition_name: Create Screencast To Demo Basic Features Of Android Mobile Banking App

text:
Hello,
When testing the Self Service App, when attempting to apply for a loan, the app would crash. I found this to happen on several phones and Android APIs. I also saw that this was an issue on GitHub. Should I still include this feature on the demo video, though it will crash, or leave it out?
